DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim assess safety efficiency Tiger II ( 5Fr ; Terumo Interventional Systems , Somerset , New Jersey ) v Judkins ( 5Fr ; 3.5L/4R , Medtronic Co ) catheter , coronary angiography via right transradial route . This prospective , randomize , two-centre , study parallel design . Consecutive patient acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) , eligible non-urgent coronary angiography , randomize successful cannulation right radial artery inform consent either Tigger II Judkins 3.5L/4R catheter .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Comparison JUDkins v tiGEr Catheter Coronary Angiography Via Right Radial Artery : JUDGE Study

In case failure complete coronary angiogram catheter study crossover catheter study take place except case severe spasm , catheter choice discretion operator . In case failure study 's catheter , next catheter 's selection operator 's discretion . Patients include study , process adhoc PCI , monitor baseline creatinine creatinine value day 2 3 coronary angiography . In angiography film conduct offline analysis two experience operator score opacification grade coronary ostium contact catheter use . DEFINITIONS Mild spasm Spasm cause well tolerate local pain Moderate spasm Spasm cause severe pain handle catheter remain satisfactory Severe spasm Spasm lead change diagnostic catheter access site Duration coronary angiogram Is defined time insertion first diagnostic coronary catheter sheath exit last diagnostic catheter sheath Radiation time Radiation time insertion first diagnostic coronary catheter right radial sheath exit last diagnostic catheter sheath Dose area product ( DAP ) DAP insertion first diagnostic coronary catheter sheath exit last diagnostic catheter sheath Contrast volume Contrast volume ( ml ) use insertion first diagnostic coronary catheter sheath exit last diagnostic catheter sheath Contrast induce nephropathy ( CIN ) Relative increase ≥25 % baseline absolute increase ≥ 0.5mg/dl serum creatinine within 48-72 hour intravenous contrast administration Opacification grade 0=poor/non-diagnostic 1. moderate opacification systole diastole 2. moderate opacification throughout cardiac cycle 3. complete opacification throughout cardiac cycle 4. complete opacification throughout cardiac cycle Catheter contact coronary ostium 0=none non-diagnostic study 1=none diagnostic study 2=non-coaxial contact 3=coaxial contact Catheter stability within coronary ostium 0=no catheter 's steady engagement ostium throughout angiographic view 1=catheter 's steady engagement ostium throughout angiographic view Catheter failure Completion coronary angiogram study catheter crossover without right radial access site crossover Based pilot data previously publish data hypothesize Tiger catheter use lead absolute decrease least 5 ml contrast volume compare Judkins catheter ( 48 53 ml Tiger και Judkins catheter respectively , estimate standard deviation 17 ) . With 2-sided alpha 0.05 , group sample size 316 316 achieve 95 % power detect difference .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written inform consent 2 . Indication nonurgent coronary angiography 3 . Successful cannulation right radial artery 4 . Availability Tiger JL3.5/JR4 catheter Exclusion Criteria 1 . Indication urgent coronary angiography ( STelevation myocardial infarction non STelevation myocardial infarction indication coronary angiogram within 2 hour ) 2 . Hemodynamic instability 3 . Non palpable right coronary artery 4 . Abnormal Allen test 5 . Prior coronary artery bypass graft 6 . Chronic kidney disease dialysis
